color-no-hex.message: Hardcoded hex colors are prohibited. Use design tokens from app/styles/theme.css (e.g., var(--mm-gray-500), var(--mm-color-primary-600)). See PHASE2_DESIGN_TOKEN_MIGRATION.md for approved tokens.

function-disallowed-list.message: RGB colors are prohibited. Use design tokens from app/styles/theme.css. Exception: rgba() with var() inside is allowed for opacity adjustments.
